description: Department of National Defense (DND) \\u00a0has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above\\u00a0
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Information

*   **Title:** Special Advisor, Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region
*   **Reference Number:** cb-442-47055421
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Solicitation Number:** S4946346
*   **Publication Date:** 2024-06-04
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-11T13:00:00 (expired)

## Tender Details

*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

## Notice Information

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defense
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Name: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
    *   Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
    *   Phone: (613) 971-7955
    *   Fax: None
*   **Attachments:**
    *   British: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39481/s4946346---method-1---rfp-%281.pdf>
    *   French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39481/s4946346---method-1---dp.pdf>

## Requirement Description

The Department of National Defense (DND) requires Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region. This requirement is open only to those SA holders who qualified under stream 13.9 Special Advisor. The resources required have a minimum security level of Secret.

**Note:** The deadline for this tender announcement has already expired. Therefore, it is no longer possible to submit a proposal. Please refer to the Canadian Government Public Tender Portal for active opportunities: [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders). If you have any further questions, please contact [CF
